recipesJson.name: Purple Wine Gum
recipesJson.author: DontTrustTheRabbit
recipesJson.description: I do not know how i got there, i think i was trying to be fancy, but this ended up tasting just like a UK purple/black wine gum. This flavour is hard to describe if you have not had one, it does not taste like the seperate elements, generally tangy and sweet and sort of fruity.
